alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Clark; Madison (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 1:59PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL CHAMPAIGN, EASTERN CLARK AND CENTRAL MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 230 PM EDT... At 159 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over South Charleston, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Springfield, London, West Jefferson, South Charleston, Choctaw Lake, Harmony, Lisbon, Brighton, Lafayette, South Vienna, Catawba, Buck Creek State Park, Interstate 70 at US Route 42, Powhattan, Pitchin, Catawba Station, Interstate 70 at State Route 56, New Moorefield and Plattsburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
